pages.text: Project Rankine adds some new trades to the market for you to dump excess resources for cold hard emeralds and do a bit of shopping for those materials that might be hard to come by. There are a few miscellaneous trades added to current villagers, but most are added to the new professions.

pages.title: Metallurgist
pages.text: POI: Template Table  $(br2)The Metallurgist deals with all things metal. Well, maybe not all of them because there are a lot. At least there are a few valuable ones.

pages.title: Mineralogist
pages.text: POI: Piston Crusher  $(br2)The Mineralogist deals with all things minerals. Some tools and precious ores can be acquired for a variety of purposes.

pages.title: Botanist
pages.text: POI: Botanist Station  $(br2)The Botanist deals with all things plants. Fauna from all the dimensions can be bought or sold here. Some may look pretty, some are edible, and some might make you cry.

pages.title: Gem Cutter
pages.text: POI: Diamond Anvil Cell  $(br2)The Gem Cutter deals with all things gems. Who doesn't want to have shiny things? Well if you don't, then maybe green will suit your fancy if you trade in.

pages.title: Rock Collector
pages.text: POI: Sediment Fan  $(br2)The Rock Collector has a lot of rocks, and wants more. Got a lot of extra rocks laying around? Well then maybe unload a few or pick up a new sample.
